uvi.description:
smackfs: restrict bytes count in smk_set_cipso()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.240 by commit 5c2dca9a7a7ff6a2df34158903515e2e4fd3d2b2. For more details please see the references link.
